column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Everything is very trendy
column2: and I guess I would describe it as "clean and colorfully rustic" if that makes sense. There are tables
column6: and outdoor tables that you can sit at. On Saturday mornings
column8: but don't let that stop you! I've never had to wait for a table
column9: and I've come here at least two dozen times in the past 7-8 months. The people who take your order are extremely friendly; don't be afraid to ask what is inside the pastries. They all have weird names (many that I've never heard of before) so I had no idea what to order the first time I came. Added bonus: the servers all wear fashionable hats!
